summary: The glass armor has been re-textured and made a stand alone mod where is does not replace the original armor in the game.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------
Night Blood Armor - Stand Alone Version 1.1
-------------------------------

Changes
----------------------------------

 v1.0:
-First release
 V1.01:
-Attempted to up the resolution of the armor to 4096x4096
 v1.02:
-Fixed multiple texture issues in gauntlets and boots, will finish curiass and helmet at a later date.
 v1.1:
-Made the mod a stand alone armor set, put custom stats on it, and made it forge-able under glass.

Overview
----------------------------------
I took the glass armor and re-textured to make it a little better looking, then made it a stand alone mod that can be made in a forge under the glass crafting, and put costume stats on the armor.

Installation
----------------------------------

Unzip the downloaded file into the Data file in your main Skyrim directory.

Uninstall
----------------------------------

Remove the NightBlood file from textures\\armor\\NightBlood
Remove the HightBlood file from meshes\\armor\\NightBlood
Remove the NightBloodArmor.esp file from the main data dir.
author: Cis190
